Occupation History:
Peters Peeters Lemaire is a 39 year old Partner from Belgium. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
In 2010, Peters Peeters Lemaire started working as a Associate Attorney at Liedekerke Wolters Waelbroeck Kirkpatrick, marking the beginning of his successful career.
At Linklaters LLP, he held the position of Senior Associate from 2014 to 2019, making significant contributions to the organization.
From 2021 till now, he served as a Partner at Linklaters LLP, solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
